Blog.post: For all of you losers who dont know me and spend all of your time on the internet sarching for cool sites like mine. . . my name is Bobby,bob,robert,rob, and chester. Under no circumstances may you call me robby if for some reason you do you will have to face the master. I work at a grocery store (Giant Eagle), i push carts, i am the smoothest mother fucker there. Well just the other day some decided to piss me off. He was a wigger so naturally i had to say some thing, so i did, i said "word up my negro friend!" (he is white) he got all pissy with me. he called me a bitch! Who the hell does he think he is? He dares challenge the master!? at once i knew he was no match for my supreme skills in the art of every thing but specialy in the fighting style of the flying chimpanzi. so he sees me circling him, puffing out my cheeks, and waving my arms around. So i decided to do what the monkeys do, I grabbed him by the tesicles and ran like a bitch on fire! he cried like a girl. *NOTE* This post is in no relations to Justin Zaruba's post on urlLink www.whatgreentasteslike.blogspot.com . good guy justin is but because he has declared himself "The Master" I to must destroy him in a most pitiful way.

ok me and my friend jeff were walking down the street when this greasey little man with a wifebeater on walks out from this chinease restraunt (Hong Kong Buffet). We both chuckled at this plump little gerbal looking man. so we go into this hong kong food place first thing happens is jeff gets kicked in the mouth well would have if he wouldnt have been in his ANTI-NINJA MODE so he ducks and kicks this ninja in his "no-no's". he gets up and we look around and see like 50 ninjas. At once i snapped into my hidden monkey crouching forest rat mixed with my own favorite style the raging leper. Now Jeff on the other hand went into his own style The angry samon wet slap. together we not only kicked 50 ninjas asses but we destroyed them . then we say down and ate an egg roll.i realized i stubbed my toe so i got pissed and walked out leaving jeff to pay the bill. Ha stupid Fucker!
in recent addition my friend Jeff has been added to the team. i hope you enjoy his fascinating ways of telling different stories in an entirley different style than me. if not than fuck off.

Alright i realize outta all the posts i've made (not many. . . yet) this is the 3rd Giant Eagle story but bare with me. I had just gone on my break 15 minutes of freedom when some fatty comes up to me and says to me "i dont think you have a turkey gravy" i in reply to her nonsence blabber tell her aisle 3 she says "its not there" so i didnt want to spend my hole break explaining to this walrus that we have turkey gravy its just in aisle 3, sooooo instead i turn and walk away she threatens to tell my manager. How can she do that? How can she threaten me? The master? i turn back around stroll right up to her and as her "you dared to invoke my wrath? you have called doom upon yourself." she then threatens again "im gonna have you fired for being so rude." Now this i can not take, this whale wants me fired for being rude? she wants fucking turkey gravy! that is unexeptable! so i slapped her. i told her "next time that hand is coming from switzerland." she looked at me confused so i slapped her again. "get out of my store before you invoke my rage anymore." i never seen fatties run so fast.
If there is onething i hate more than hics its wiggers. . . . . . . . . . .so i killed them
email me let me know what you think of my site at the beginings of its creation. tfishtaco@yahoo.com

This story also takes place at Giant Eagle. . . . well i live in a hic town only people that live here are drunks, cripples, retards, sluts, hics, wiggers, and/or assholes. Well the one of the things i hate is hics, they piss me off. i was pushing some carts into the right tactical position after doing 90 degree turn to the right and then 360 degree turn to the left. I was such a fly mother fucker coming in there when i here this guy mumbling. i get closer still all i here is mumbling so i get just about right next to him and he still mumbles and slurs words like a fucking drunken retard hic. god damn!oh thats the story. nothing really funny. only cool part was when i told you about how smooth i was.

i wanted to be part of the spice girls. but they said no. i got pissed. but because im one fly mother fucker i was friends with one of them. Baby spice. we had a short and intimate relationship. im her baby's daddy. all that time when people were making rumors about who the father of her baby was when she was pregnant. . . .well they were wrong it was me. also Brittany Spears i did her. avril lavigne i did her. amy lee i did her. i did every one. bill cosby i did him. fat joe i did him. Barry white i did him. i did everyone. . . . . but no fatties.

ok im back. i hadnt posted for a while and now i . . . am . ?. . i dont know all well. oh yeah, JEFF YOU FUCKER YOU ETTER START POSTING! oh yeah my story. . . . i walked into this restraunt and sat down and began ordering some food when out of te corner of my eye i see this big hump of lard sweating his ass off. i look over my shoulder and i now can see this isnt just any puddle of blub, this is william "mutha fuckin' " shatner. i dont like him. but i chose to ignore the fact that he was there. so i try to enjoy my meal but evry to seconds this walrus is laughing and spraying food all over the place. i get annoyed so i get up walk to his table and say "Listen beaver tits, i dont like you and worse yet i dont like hearing you laugh. i hope you die. nw leave before you face one of the many ultimate fighting styles "the rabid mink." he just stared at me with that stupid blank turkey face so i slapped him. within 5 seconds there were 9 guys grabbing me throwing me out of the restraunt and 2 of them kicked me in the head. i got SUPER PISSED . i ran in there and was in my "lippery when wet"stance. evryone in the restraunt came at me but before they even got to me they incinerated. that is just how good i am. then i asked for a doggie bag and went home.
